name: Avoid class with too many fields (Flex)
description: This QR detects class with more than 5 fields.
output:
This QR detects class with more than 5 fields. It provides following information:

- Artifact full name
rationale: Classes that have too many fields could be redesigned to have fewer fields, possibly  through some nested object grouping of some of the information.  For example, a class with  city/state/zipcode fields could instead have one Address field.
remediation: Refactor class to have fields less than 5 fields.
alternativeName: Avoid class with too many fields (Flex)

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Modularity and OO Encapsulation Conformity
